content: @Camelid moving here from the major change -- I think it might make sense to add an ellipsis, though it does waste quite a bit of space
maybe a unicode ellipsis (which might count as one character? We'd have to look at how Zulip's limitation is implemented) would work
That's a good idea. I assume it treats Unicode as a single character, but it is in Python, so I'll have to check
I'll create a dummy topic in the zulip stream to test it out

Okay, based on a quick test in the zulip stream (https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/122653-zulip/topic/This.20is.20a.20dummy.20topic.20to.20test.20how.20Zulip.20treats.20Unicode.20char.E2.80.A6), it appears that a Unicode ellipsis is treated as a single character
